body.p:
H"d Q"rs Co. D. 18th regt Ky vet vol Inft
Ringgold G. A. June 13th /64
His Excellency
Thomas E Bramblette
Sir

I have learned that you are raising State troops for the defence of our State which bring's joy to the hearts of Ky's Sons who have been combating a traitors foe while thier homes have been burned & relativs & friend murdered by a Set of vandals -- I am ready to tender you my Service Should you think proper to commission me as field officer of one of the regts about to be raised by draft I Can give you any Regmental or Brigade refferance as to Qualification and valor I have been in the U. S. Service almost 3 years have Seen verry hard Service with my regt in ever action or Skermish it has been in

I have the Honor
To be Your Obt Servt
James L Dougherty
Capt, co, D, 18, Ky, vet, V, I

Thomas E Bramlette
Gov" State of Kentucky

Hd qrs Co D 18th Ky Infty
Ringgold Ga
June 13th 1864
Daugherty Jas L
Capt Co D.
To the Governor desiring a field commission in one of the new regiments of 6 months troops you are raising

L B No 4 -- 1864 P. 316
Recd A G O 20 June 1864
